value.name: Cummings considering run for Indiana Attorney General
value.description: Depending on the fate of Indiana Attorney General Todd Rokita in the coming weeks, Madison County Prosecutor Rodney Cummings is interested in the position. Last year Cummings announced he was seeking the Republican Party nomination for the 5th Congressional District but later withdrew from the race.

value.name: Gen Z are making up deadly hurricanes that kill thousands… just for fun
value.description: It was 6am in Honduras when Tropical Storm Jose, hovering dangerously close to the coast, was officially declared a hurricane. Six hours later, as 110mph winds whipped the Caribbean Sea into a furious lather, it was upgraded to a Category 2 storm.

value.name: UK Child Activity Workers To Be 'Legally Obliged' To Report Child Sexual Abuse
value.description: UK's sex offense laws are going to be strengthened with stricter child sexual abuse law which makes it a punishable offence to hide any child sexual exploitation leading to prison term.

value.name: Government backs crackdown on spurious legal actions
value.description: Proposals to crack down on spurious legal claims used to silence journalists and other critics have been backed by the government. Strategic Lawsuits Against Public Participation, known as Slapps, are often used by rich individuals to stop the exposure of wrongdoing.

value.name: Uk politics: Sunak ‘concerned’ over Hoyle’s rule change but gives credit over speaker’s apology – as it happened
value.description: She says to suggest that the “shameful events” that took place yesterday were anything other than party politics is to do a disservice to the house. She says it fell to the government to defend the rights of a minority party (the SNP) in the house.

value.name: Ukraine war: UK reaffirms Ukraine support on war anniversary
value.description: Political leaders in the UK have reaffirmed their support for Ukraine ahead of the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said Britain was prepared to do "whatever it takes, for as long as it takes" to help Ukraine achieve victory.
